name: BatchRetrieveOrders
description:
Retrieves a set of [orders](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/Order) by their IDs.

If a given order ID does not exist, the ID is ignored instead of generating an error.

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$block:
Defines the fields that are included in the response body of
a request to the `BatchRetrieveOrders` endpoint.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**orders**: The requested orders. This will omit any requested orders that do not exist.
